1: שׁ֚וּבָה <sup>7725 </sup> <n>return</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>O Israel</n> עַ֖ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> כָשַׁ֖לְתָּ <sup>3782 </sup> <n>for thou hast fallen</n> בַּעֲוֹנֶֽךָ׃ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>by thine iniquity</n>
2: קְח֤וּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>Take</n> עִמָּכֶם֙ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> דְּבָרִ֔ים <sup>1697 </sup> <n>with you words</n> וְשׁ֖וּבוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and turn</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>to the LORD</n> אִמְר֣וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>say</n> אֵלָ֗יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>away</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> תִּשָּׂ֤א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>unto him Take away</n> עָוֹן֙ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>all iniquity</n> וְקַח־ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and receive</n> ט֔וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>[us] graciously</n> וּֽנְשַׁלְּמָ֥ה <sup>7999 </sup> <n>so will we render</n> פָרִ֖ים <sup>6499 </sup> <n>the calves</n> שְׂפָתֵֽינוּ׃ <sup>8193 </sup> <n>of our lips</n>
3: אַשּׁ֣וּר ׀ <sup>804 </sup> <n>Asshur</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יוֹשִׁיעֵ֗נוּ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>shall not save</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> סוּס֙ <sup>5483 </sup> <n>upon horses</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> נִרְכָּ֔ב <sup>7392 </sup> <n>us we will not ride</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> נֹ֥אמַר <sup>559 </sup> <n>neither will we say</n> ע֛וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <sup>430 </sup> <n>[Ye are] our gods</n> לְמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <sup>4639 </sup> <n>any more to the work</n> יָדֵ֑ינוּ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of our hands</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> בְּךָ֖ יְרֻחַ֥ם <sup>7355 </sup> <n>findeth mercy</n> יָתֽוֹם׃ <sup>3490 </sup> <n>for in thee the fatherless</n>
4: אֶרְפָּא֙ <sup>7495 </sup> <n>I will heal</n> מְשׁ֣וּבָתָ֔ם <sup>4878 </sup> <n>their backsliding</n> אֹהֲבֵ֖ם <sup>157 </sup> <n>I will love</n> נְדָבָ֑ה <sup>5071 </sup> <n>them freely</n> כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> שָׁ֥ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>is turned away</n> אַפִּ֖י <sup>639 </sup> <n>for mine anger</n> מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n>
5: אֶהְיֶ֤ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will be like</n> כַטַּל֙ <sup>2919 </sup> <n>I will be as the dew</n> לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>unto Israel</n> יִפְרַ֖ח <sup>6524 </sup> <n>he shall grow</n> כַּשּֽׁוֹשַׁנָּ֑ה <sup>7799 </sup> <n>as the lily</n> וְיַ֥ךְ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>and cast forth</n> שָׁרָשָׁ֖יו <sup>8328 </sup> <n>his roots</n> כַּלְּבָנֽוֹן׃ <sup>3844 </sup> <n>as Lebanon</n>
6: יֵֽלְכוּ֙ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>will sprout</n> יֹֽנְקוֹתָ֔יו <sup>3127 </sup> <n>His branches</n> וִיהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will be like</n> כַזַּ֖יִת <sup>2132 </sup> <n>shall be as the olive tree</n> הוֹד֑וֹ <sup>1935 </sup> <n>and his beauty</n> וְרֵ֥יחַֽ <sup>7381 </sup> <n>and his smell</n> ל֖וֹ כַּלְּבָנֽוֹן׃ <sup>3844 </sup> <n>as Lebanon</n>
7: יָשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>shall return</n> יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <sup>3427 </sup> <n>They that dwell</n> בְצִלּ֔וֹ <sup>6738 </sup> <n>under his shadow</n> יְחַיּ֥וּ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>they shall revive</n> דָגָ֖ן <sup>1715 </sup> <n>[as] the corn</n> וְיִפְרְח֣וּ <sup>6524 </sup> <n>and grow</n> כַגָּ֑פֶן <sup>1612 </sup> <n>as the vine</n> זִכְר֖וֹ <sup>2143 </sup> <n>the scent</n> כְּיֵ֥ין <sup>3196 </sup> <n>thereof [shall be] as the wine</n> לְבָנֽוֹן׃ <sup>3844 </sup> <n>of Lebanon</n> ס
8: אֶפְרַ֕יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>Ephraim</n> מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>what</n> לִּ֥י ע֖וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>more</n> לָֽעֲצַבִּ֑ים <sup>6091 </sup> <n>idol</n> אֲנִ֧י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> עָנִ֣יתִי <sup>6030 </sup> <n>testify</n> וַאֲשׁוּרֶ֗נּוּ <sup>7789 </sup> <n>[him] and observed</n> אֲנִי֙ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> כִּבְר֣וֹשׁ <sup>1265 </sup> <n>fir tree</n> רַֽעֲנָ֔ן <sup>7488 </sup> <n>him I [am] like a green</n> מִמֶּ֖נִּי <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> פֶּרְיְךָ֥ <sup>6529 </sup> <n>From me is thy fruit</n> נִמְצָֽא׃ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>found</n>
9: מִ֤י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Whoever</n> חָכָם֙ <sup>2450 </sup> <n>Who [is] wise</n> וְיָ֣בֵֽן <sup>995 </sup> <n>and he shall understand</n> אֵ֔לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> נָב֖וֹן <sup>995 </sup> <n>these [things]? prudent</n> וְיֵֽדָעֵ֑ם <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and he shall know</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יְשָׁרִ֞ים <sup>3477 </sup> <n>[are] right</n> דַּרְכֵ֣י <sup>1870 </sup> <n>them? for the ways</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> וְצַדִּקִים֙ <sup>6662 </sup> <n>and the just</n> יֵ֣לְכוּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>will walk</n> בָ֔ם וּפֹשְׁעִ֖ים <sup>6586 </sup> <n>in them but the transgressors</n> יִכָּ֥שְׁלוּ <sup>3782 </sup> <n>shall fall</n> בָֽם׃
